title: Beautiful Fully Renovated 2 BD w/ Yard & Garage
posting_body: Pre leasing now!
2 BDRM 1 BTH In Renovated 6 Plex Unit A
Available early/mid October
Fenced Yard, 1 Car Garage, Off Street Parking
Large Living Room
All New Appliances (Stainless Kitchen, Washer Dryer White)
Granite/Quartz Counter Top
New Carpet and Vinyl
Fresh Paint and Trim
*Fireplace Inoperable*
Visit <URL>/ for my information and to apply
$90/Month W/S/G
Pet Friendly
Breed Restrictions Apply
2 Pet MAX
Single Dog- $450 nonrefundable pet fee/ $25 monthly pet rent
Single Cat-$225 nonrefundable pet fee, $225 refundable pet deposit/ $25 monthly pet rent
Additional deposit of $225 required for an additional pet/ additional $25 monthly pet rent
Additional deposit of $225 for puppies under 1 year old.
$250 holding fee due at time of application (nonrefundable)
$500.00 security deposit due at move in
A $45 non-refundable application fee is required for everybody over the age of 18 years to cover the administrative costs of reviewing credit, criminal, and rental histories.
Each application needs to be accompanied by the $45 application fee.
Rental Qualifications: 1) Monthly income is equal to 2.5 times the monthly rent amount.
2) Positive credit rating.
3) Criminal felonies or convictions of a crime against person or property reviewed on a case-by-case basis.
4) No negative rental history.
Additional deposits or co-signers may be requested if some qualifications are not met.
Occupancy guidelines according to HUD guidelines permit no more than 2 persons per bedroom, plus one additional occupant.
***Renters insurance is required***
